text: > South Carolina Appreciation: Spurrier changed the game, did things his way FILE - In this Oct. 31, 1976 file photo, Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Steve Spurrier goes down against the Kansas City Chiefs during an NFL football game in Tampa Bay, Fla. Spurrier plays his final game of a 10-year NFL season a 31-14 loss to the New England Patriots for his 0-14 Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Dec. 12, 1976. He completed 52 percent of his passes for 6,878 yards, 40 touchdowns and 60 interceptions in his NFL career.(AP Photo)
